Hi, a person on the spectrum here:

Telling you to go fuck yourself would be too polite.https://twitter.com/ShireenQudosi/status/1139023857912729601 …

1148679061356437504.text: Her whole gaslighting garbage "every mother of an autistic child I know" spiel pisses me off so much. What a strawman. My cousin is autistic and his mom, my aunt (from NJ) would be the first person to punch this lady in the face for spouting this trash.

1148679416869990401.text:
Her "I lost my son that day" comment threw me over the edge. By saying that she's implying that autism somehow makes her son less of a person?

Ignoring the stupid vaccine thing cause I don't even have time for that nonsense lol

1148679670952427520.text: Yeah that's awful. What a way to literally dehumanize not only your own child, but every single other person on the spectrum.
